name: sp365.pro
description: My name is João Lopes and I'm a SharePoint Solutions Architect based in Australia. With several years of experience in building and delivering robust SharePoint solutions, I provide Technical consulting services to businesses looking to turn an idea into a SharePoint solution. Let's get in touch!
